## Description {#details}

Sample-based profile writer (text format).

## Public Member Functions

### writeSample() {#acdb8f85283e93399278cbe5363f944da}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code SampleProfileWriterText::writeSample (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &amp; S)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Write samples to a text file.

Note: it may be tempting to implement this in terms of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples/#adca18b92b535ad86d151efc86442027d">FunctionSamples::print()</a>. Please don&#39;t. The dump functionality is intended for debugging and has no specified form.

The format used here is more structured and deliberate because it needs to be parsed by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/sampleprofilereadertext">SampleProfileReaderText</a> class.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h/#l00168">168</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h">SampleProfWriter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-cpp/#l00566">566</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-cpp">SampleProfWriter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### Indent {#ab33d18250a9ddd3675d2c81c8718aa46}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::sampleprof::SampleProfileWriterText::Indent = 0">
Indent level to use when writing.

This is used when printing inlined callees.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h/#l00187">187</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h">SampleProfWriter.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### MarkFlatProfiles {#a3b8422817129882c5629dcbad13f3aeb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::sampleprof::SampleProfileWriterText::MarkFlatProfiles = false">
If set, writes metadata &quot;!Flat&quot; to functions without inlined functions.

This flag is for manual inspection only, it has no effect for the profile reader because a text sample profile is read sequentially and functions cannot be skipped.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h/#l00193">193</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/sampleprofwriter-h">SampleProfWriter.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
